member.name: IDCompositionScaleTransform3D.SetCenterX
member.summary: Changes the value of the CenterX property of a 3D scale transform. The CenterX property specifies the x-coordinate of the point about which scaling is performed.
member.param: The new x-coordinate of the center point.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionScaleTransform3D.SetCenterX
member.summary: Animates the value of the CenterX property of a 3D scale transform. The CenterX property specifies the x-coordinate of the point about which scaling is performed.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the CenterX property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionScaleTransform3D.SetCenterY
member.summary: Changes the value of the CenterY property of a 3D scale transform. The CenterY property specifies the y-coordinate of the point about which scaling is performed.
member.param: The new y-coordinate of the center point.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionScaleTransform3D.SetCenterY
member.summary: Animates the value of the CenterY property of a 3D scale transform. The CenterY property specifies the y-coordinate of the point about which scaling is performed.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the CenterY property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionScaleTransform3D.SetCenterZ
member.summary: Changes the value of the CenterZ property of a 3D scale transform. The CenterZ property specifies the z-coordinate of the point about which scaling is performed.
member.param: The new z-coordinate of the center point.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionScaleTransform3D.SetCenterZ
member.summary: Animates the value of the CenterZ property of a 3D scale transform. The CenterZ property specifies the z-coordinate of the point about which scaling is performed.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the CenterZ property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionScaleTransform3D.SetScaleX
member.summary: Changes the value of the ScaleX property of a 3D scale transform. The ScaleX property specifies the scale factor along the x-axis.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionScaleTransform3D.SetScaleX
member.summary: Animates the value of the ScaleX property of a scale transform. The ScaleX property specifies the scale factor along the x-axis.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the ScaleX property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionScaleTransform3D.SetScaleY
member.summary: Changes the value of the ScaleY property of a 3D scale transform. The ScaleY property specifies the scale factor along the y-axis.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionScaleTransform3D.SetScaleY
member.summary: Animates the value of the ScaleY property of a scale transform. The ScaleY property specifies the scale factor along the y-axis.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the ScaleY property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionScaleTransform3D.SetScaleZ
member.summary: Changes the value of the ScaleZ property of a 3D scale transform. The ScaleZ property specifies the scale factor along the z-axis.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionScaleTransform3D.SetScaleZ
member.summary: Animates the value of the ScaleZ property of a scale transform. The ScaleZ property specifies the scale factor along the z-axis.
member.param: An animation object that determines how the value of the ScaleZ property changes over time. This parameter must not be NULL.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See DirectComposition Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IDCompositionScaleTransform3D
member.summary: Represents a 3D transformation effect that affects the scale of a visual along the x-axis, y-axis, and z-axis. The coordinate system is scaled from the specified center point.
